title: 761. Week 17 Big Games, AFC & NFC Playoff Picture + Rookie QB Report Card
itunes:title: 761. Week 17 Big Games, AFC & NFC Playoff Picture + Rookie QB Report Card
description:
Daniel Jeremiah, Bucky Brooks and Rhett Lewis look back at the weekend and all the action from Week 17 of the NFL season with a focus on the AFC and NFC playoff picture throughout the episode. The guys start by breaking down the big games from the weekend. Next, the trio look ahead to the Los Angeles Chargers vs. Las Vegas Raiders Week 18 matchup. Then, the guys look at if the Tampa Bay Buccaneers have enough moving forward after losing wide receiver Antonio Brown and due to their other injuries. After that, the trio discuss who the biggest threat to the Green Bay Packers in the NFC is. Following that, the guys give 8 New Year's resolutions for teams. Next, the trio give a grade to the rookie quarterbacks based off their Week 17 performances. Then, the guys analyze if a player's decision to opt out of his bowl game affects his draft stock. To wrap up the show, the trio preview Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger's likely last home game against the Cleveland Browns on Monday Night Football.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
